Name: Geo Crystalfly
Desc: Pure elemental life-forms composed of drifting Geo particles, as free and unbound as the butterflies they resemble.\nA glittering Geo creature that is the product of rising and condensing elements, and which feeds off the ubiquitous power of Geo.\nIn antediluvian ages, even rocks could dream. They say that these crystallized flying butterflies are those very dreams the mountains had.
